name: Added Credentials to Existing Application
description: Detects when a new credential is added to an existing application. Any additional credentials added outside of expected processes could be a malicious actor using those credentials.
author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', Bailey Bercik '@baileybercik'

detection.query: selection: {"properties.message": ["Update Application-Certificates and secrets management", "Update Service principal/Update Application"]}

falsepositives: When credentials are added/removed as part of the normal working hours/workflows
